children.html:
One of the strength of YouTubers compared to traditional celebrities is their seeming normality 
        and closeness to their community.
        This video is a compilation of YouTubers engaging in public disclosure, coming-outs, dead husbands or divorces ... 
        anything goes to create an emotional attachment to their audience. 
        Of course, the end of these confession videos 
        "like and subscribe to my channel!", betrays the instrumental aim and commercialism of the confession.

Mash-up, more-or-less famous youtubers being intimate with their followers :
  • #Beauty101byLisa - MY HUSBAND IS DIVORCING ME
  • #ConnorFranta - Coming Out
  • #ErinNoelle - My Boyfriend Died
  • #KeepCalmAndBlushOn - my husband left me. (not click bait unfortunately)
  • #loveMichelleAna - Life Update My Husband Passed Away
  • #RiyadhK - Coming Out & Dad's Shocking Confession
  • #TheRhodesBros - Twins Come Out To Dad
  • #TroyeSivan - Coming Out
